user_prompt: As a bank customer, I require a modern, user-friendly self-service portal that allows me to efficiently manage my banking needs without visiting physical branches. I need to securely log in using multi-factor authentication and access a personalized dashboard displaying available banking products and services based on my profile and eligibility. The portal must enable me to submit account opening requests and service modifications through streamlined workflows requiring minimal clicks. I expect to receive real-time status updates and email notifications regarding my submitted requests. The system should maintain a comprehensive history of all my interactions while ensuring my sensitive financial data remains secure. The portal must be responsive across various devices, providing a consistent experience whether I access it via desktop, tablet, or mobile phone. I should be able to save incomplete applications and return to them later, with the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface. The solution must integrate seamlessly with the bank's existing core banking system while maintaining its own database to ensure optimal performance and reliability. Role-based access controls must be implemented to ensure I can only view and access services appropriate to my profile and authorization level.

epics.title: Multi-Factor Authentication and Secure Login
epics.summary: Develop a secure customer login process with multi-factor authentication.
epics.description: Implement a secure authentication workflow that ensures customer identities are verified through multi-factor authentication (MFA) methods such as OTP, biometrics, or authenticator apps. This functionality should align with banking security standards, protect user credentials, and include safeguards like account lockout, session timeout, and encrypted data transmission to ensure high levels of security and reliability.

epics.title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard displaying relevant banking products and services.
epics.description: Develop a dynamic, customizable dashboard that presents account summaries, product recommendations, and quick links tailored to each customer's profile and eligibility. This dashboard should retrieve data securely from the bank’s core systems in real time and offer intuitive navigation for accessing key services efficiently, providing customers with a clear and interactive overview of their banking relationship.

epics.title: Responsive Portal Interface
epics.summary: Build a responsive, user-friendly interface for multiple devices.
epics.description: Design and develop a responsive front-end that provides a consistent and accessible experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The portal should adhere to accessibility standards, offer intuitive navigation, and maintain consistent performance on various screen sizes. The aim is to deliver a seamless user experience with fast load times and clear, concise layouts.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Enable customers to open new accounts and modify existing services online.
epics.description: Design and implement guided workflows for customers to initiate account openings, service modifications, and updates. The workflows should be intuitive, require minimal clicks, and include form pre-filling and real-time validation. These should integrate with internal approval and verification systems to streamline requests while maintaining data accuracy and compliance.

epics.title: Document Upload and Verification System
epics.summary: Provide functionality for customers to upload and validate required documents securely.
epics.description: Develop a secure document management module that allows customers to upload necessary documentation for various requests, such as account openings or profile changes. The system should validate file formats, encrypt files during transmission and storage, and link each uploaded document to the relevant workflow. Include backend integration for document verification and audit tracking.

epics.title: Save and Resume Applications
epics.summary: Allow customers to save incomplete applications and resume later.
epics.description: Implement a save-and-resume capability for customers to store progress during partial application completion. This functionality should securely store entered data and documents, maintain state between sessions, and allow users to resume precisely where they left off. Include autosave functionality to prevent accidental data loss and ensure customer convenience during extended workflows.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time updates and notifications for customer requests.
epics.description: Integrate a real-time notification and tracking system that alerts customers about the current status of their requests, including account openings and service modifications. Enable email and in-portal alerts triggered by workflow events. Allow customers to configure their notification preferences, ensuring transparency and improving engagement throughout the process lifecycle.

epics.title: Interaction History and Audit Trail
epics.summary: Maintain a complete customer interaction history within the portal.
epics.description: Build a robust activity tracking and audit system that logs all customer interactions, including requests, modifications, and document uploads. The portal should provide customers with transparent access to their history while supporting compliance with data retention regulations. All records should be immutable and time-stamped to ensure traceability and security.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement secure and granular access management based on user roles.
epics.description: Introduce a role-based access control (RBAC) mechanism ensuring customers only access products and services aligned with their profiles and authorization levels. This system should maintain integration with authentication services and dynamically manage permissions. Administrative functionality should support defining roles, managing permissions, and auditing access configurations.

epics.title: Core Banking Integration and Data Layer Setup
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the core banking system and establish its own database.
epics.description: Develop and configure a middleware integration layer between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking system. The integration should enable bi-directional data exchange, ensuring customer and transactional details are synchronized in real time. Create a dedicated performance-optimized database for the portal with caching strategies, encryption, and data integrity checks for reliability and speed.

epics.title: Security and Compliance Framework
epics.summary: Implement an end-to-end security and compliance model for the portal.
epics.description: Deploy a comprehensive security and compliance framework covering all aspects of the self-service portal, including data encryption, intrusion detection, vulnerability management, and fraud prevention. Ensure compliance with relevant industry regulations such as GDPR, PCI DSS, and local banking data laws. Regularly perform audits, penetration testing, and real-time monitoring to ensure continuous security assurance.
